text: Muhammad Nazirul Afif bin Ibrahim (born 30 April 1997) is a Malaysian footballer who plays as a defender for Malaysian Super League club Perak II on loan from Perak. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:Malaysian footballers Category:Malaysia Super League players Category:Perak FA players Category:PKNP FC players Category:Association football defenders Category:1997 births
title: Nazirul Afif
